materials.raw_text: C4: 120 g (Calcium), Ga: 80 g (Gallium), Ti: 60 g (Titanium), V: 40 g (Vanadium)

sourcing.instructions: Calcium: Chemical supply companies; Gallium: Electronics suppliers; Titanium: Metal suppliers; Vanadium: Metal suppliers
steps: Calcium: Chemical supply companies; Gallium: Electronics suppliers; Titanium: Metal suppliers; Vanadium: Metal suppliers
1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale.

steps: 1. Gradually reduce the temperature of the furnace to room temperature over a period of 6 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. Gradually reduce the temperature of the furnace to room temperature over a period of 6 hours.

steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible.
